channel.title: Offers on Leonardo Borges
channel.description: Recent content in Offers on Leonardo Borges

item.title: were hiring
item.description: Here at Mirai we're looking for passionate software engineers. And if it's not clear, by passionate I mean people who actually enjoy their job, aren't afraid of trying new things, likes to research/study, is up to date to what's happening around them and is a true team player. Interested? Hold on, click here to find out more about the offer, as well as instructions on how to apply. Doubts? Send them to jobs@hotelsearch.
